data.name: peachfolio
data.description:
What Is peachfolio (PCHF)?

peachfolio is an app for tracking your Decentralized Finance (DeFi) portfolio. It allows users to see the current value of their DeFi cryptocurrency tokens in one easy location with the aim to give all the data needed to make informed decisions. 

PCHF is the token that is used for:

* Unlocking access to the Pro features of the peachfolio app such as profit and loss data and calculations, price notifications and alerts, voting on feature implementation and more. The full detailed roadmap is available at https://www.peachfolio.com/app-roadmap/

peachfolio mobile app include the ability to:

* Automatically pull through all tokens across multi-wallets in one list without the user adding manually.
* Price tracking of tokens with daily change percentages.
* Price charting built into the app.
* Monitoring big movers in the Defi space.
* Track any token you want via searching for it through the app.


How Many Coins Are There in Circulation?
PCHF launched on the June 20th, 2021 with 1 billion tokens in circulation at genesis. 13% is locked as a marketing wallet to be unlocked against roadmap achievements inline with the releases. Liquidity wallet is locked until 01/01/2023. A team wallet holding 8% is locked for 6 months from launch.

Who Are the Founders of PCHF Protocol?
A cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary team based around the globe who share a love of the DeFi space and want more from the apps on the market. The peachfolio team has experts from the fields of computer science, financial services, marketing, and social media.
The developer team are post-doctoral academics in computer and data science. The finance experts work in auditing and financial services change management whilst the social engagement and marketing team have experience developing innovative campaigns for some of the world's top brands. This is underpinned by project managers with a proven track record of bringing major and complex projects to completion.

Where Can I Buy peachfolio (PCHF)?
PCHF is available now across the most popular DeFi Binance Smart Chain trading platforms such as PancakeSwap. Help guides are available at Peachfolio.com for getting started.
